trends: There have been 24 other sightings in Boca Raton
There were no other sightings in Boca Raton on or around March 24th 2012
Summary: blinking red and blue with a very bright white background with some green glow
divs: Sighting Detailswhen i went to walk my dog so he could potty i noticed a blinking star-like thing in the sky with red blue and green strong bright lights i thought it was a plane but after observing for fifteen minutes i realized it was not something man made. it was hovering for about 50 minutes and started getting smaller until it disappeared but the light were still very bright. the object disappeared into the night.
